gameview

Interface IKiGameView

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IGameView
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    KIGameView

    public interface IKiGameView
extends IGameView
    The KIGameView is the viewport of the KI. It does use the same events as a normal player.
    Version:
    3.0
    Author:
    Jasper S.
